page.title: 06Men at Work
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house with my brother, sister and parents.My sister and I go to primary school and my brother goes to the academy. My mother is a home help, and my father is self-employed as an architect and gets lots of work. I asked the pupils in my year what their fathers did and found that 26.4% are self-employed as car mechanics, hotel and shop owners, electricians, decorators, joiners, farmers and fishermen. 37.5% work for Local Government departments, based in Banff, such as planning, education, roads and environmental health.The remaining 36.1% work for other employers or are unemployed.As these results came from a survey of a whole year, they would probably represent the employment situation in this area.
